iframe-config-hosts: A list of allowed hosts for iframes.
iframe-config-onwikiconfig: A boolean indicating configuration can be done on-wiki.
iframe-config-error-array-expected: The variable $iFrameDomains is expected to be an array. Got a value with a type of '$1' instead.
iframe-cfg-json-error-array-expected: The json dictionary in the [[MediaWiki:iframe-cfg.json]] page should have an array in the "domains" key. Got a value with a type of '$1' instead
iframe-invalid-domain: Invalid domain: $1.  Domain should be one of $2.
